osProfile.customData:
[base64(concat('#!/bin/bash
','
echo "export PUBLIC_IP=',reference(resourceId('Microsoft.Network/networkInterfaces', concat(variables('virtualMachine-name-prefix'), copyindex(1), '-nic1'))).ipConfigurations[0].properties.privateIpAddress,'" >> /tmp/.cbdprofile','
echo "export CB_TRAEFIK_HOST_ADDRESS=',reference(resourceId('Microsoft.Network/networkInterfaces', concat(variables('virtualMachine-name-prefix'), copyindex(1), '-nic1'))).ipConfigurations[0].properties.privateIpAddress,'" >> /tmp/.cbdprofile','
echo "export CBD_VERSION=2.7.1" >> /tmp/.cbdprofile','
echo "export CB_HOST_DISCOVERY_CUSTOM_DOMAIN=', parameters('discovery-custom-domain'),'" >> /tmp/.cbdprofile','
echo "export AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID=',subscription().subscriptionId,'" >> /tmp/.cbdprofile','
echo "export AZURE_TENANT_ID=',subscription().tenantId,'" >> /tmp/.cbdprofile','
echo "export UAA_DEFAULT_USER_EMAIL=',parameters('username'),'" >> /tmp/.cbdprofile','
echo $',variables('single-quote'), 'export UAA_DEFAULT_USER_PW=$\',variables('single-quote'),parameters('admin-password'),'\', variables('single-quote'),variables('single-quote'), '>> /tmp/.cbdprofile','
echo "export CB_SMARTSENSE_CONFIGURE=',parameters('smartsense'),'" >> /tmp/.cbdprofile','
echo "export OS_USER=',parameters('admin-username'),'" >> /tmp/.cbdprofile', '
echo "export ULU_DEFAULT_SSH_KEY=',variables('single-quote'),parameters('sshKey'),variables('single-quote'),'" >> /tmp/.cbdprofile', '
echo "export SUBNET_CIDR=',parameters('default-subnet-address-prefix'),'" >> /tmp/.cbdprofile', '
echo "export UAA_DEFAULT_SECRET=',base64(resourceGroup().id),'" >> /tmp/.cbdprofile'))]

protectedSettings.commandToExecute: [concat('bash join-ad-domain.sh ', concat(parameters('extension-name'), '-vm',copyindex(1)),' ', toUpper(parameters('domain-name')),' ', parameters('domain-admin-user'),' ', variables('single-quote'), parameters('domain-admin-password'), variables('single-quote'))]
